ingredients: 1 tsp. or 5 grams Green cardamoms skinned (elaichi)
¼ tsp. or 1.5 grams fennel seeds (saunf)
¾ tsp pepper corn or ½ tsp. powder
½ tsp. nutmeg grated or ⅓ of large nutmeg
2 petals of star flower / star anise (chakri phool)
½ tsp. masala powder (you can increase slightly for stronger tea)
1 tsp. tea powder (adjust to suit your taste)
1 tsp. freshly chopped or crushed ginger
